title: John Healey – 2022 Comments on Wasted Military Spending
author: admin
summary: The comments made by John Healey, the Shadow Secretary of State for Defence, on 5 January 2022.
content:
The Ministry of Defence has blown billions of pounds at the same time as cutting back our Armed Forces.
